title: How to Live in God's Plan
description: You can love your life, and this little book will help you do just that. These are scripture based readings with practical ways to live the life that God wants for you. There are actions you can take that will change your relationship with others, and how you think about yourself. This is the only way you will truly be happy. Learn to live with joy. Every page gives you a principal that will inprove the quality of your life.
author: Maria Loman
